articles.title: Former Watergate prosecutors urge judge to buck Justice Department and not dismiss Michael Flynn case - CNN
articles.description: Sixteen former Watergate prosecutors have told a federal judge he has the authority to sentence former Trump national security adviser Michael Flynn to prison despite the Justice Department's effort to toss the case.
